text.autoconfig.betterfoxcraft.title: BetterFoxcraft Settings
text.autoconfig.betterfoxcraft.option.ma: Max missing blocks before LayerCheck cancels
Max radius for LayerCheck that can be set
text.autoconfig.betterfoxcraft.option.to: Amount of Seconds the LayerChecker Visualization lasts
text.autoconfig.betterfoxcraft.option.ti: Amount of Ticks between the Visualization Particles Spawning
